content:
In the Black and Azov seas, Russian warships are absent on combat duty.

About thisreportedNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

There are three enemy ships in the Mediterranean, there are no carbon winged missiles.

During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation the passage of the Kerch Strait to the Azov Sea was carried out by 19 vessels, of which 3 moved from the Bosphorus Strait.

12 vessels were heading to the Black Sea, 2 of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus.

"The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (Solas), turning off automatic identification systems (AIS)," the Navy emphasized.

As reported by the Armyinform, in March forces of defenseDestroyedOne Russian ship and four more vessels were damaged.
title: There are no enemy ships in the Black and Azov Seas
description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Mediterranean are ...
author: Army Inform
